firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

otherNightReminder: The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the "Mad" reminder and the second with the "2nd" reminder. Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the player marked "Mad". Show the "This Character Selected You" info token then the Harpy token, then point to the player marked "2nd". Put the player marked "Mad" to sleep.
name: Harpy
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or both might die.

otherNightReminder: If the Hatter is marked with the "Tea Party Tonight" reminder: Wake the Minion & Demon players. Show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character. If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Remove the "Tea Party Tonight" reminder. Change each player to the character they chose.
name: Hatter
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

name: High Priestess
ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

firstNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player and a Minion character. Replace that player's token with that Minion token. Repeat until the nuormal number of Minions exist.
otherNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player. That player dies.
name: Kazali
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]

firstNightReminder: Point to two players, neither of which is the Demon.
name: Knight
ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.

otherNightReminder: The Ojo points to a character. That character, if in play, dies. If that character is not in play, choose zero, one, or more players to die.
name: Ojo
ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

otherNightReminder:
Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the "Plague Doctor" reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). 
When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

firstNightReminder: If the closest evil player is in a clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the closest player is in an anti-clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the two closest evil players are equidistant, point your finger horizontally in either direction.
name: Shugenja
ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

firstNightReminder: The Valet points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
otherNightReminder: The Valet points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
name: Valet
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, if you vote and they do not, something bad might happen.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Summoner and show them three not-in-play character tokens.
otherNightReminder: If the Summoner has a 'Night 3' reminder. Wake the Summoner. They point at a player, and a to a Demon icon on the character sheet. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the 'You are' card, the thumbs down evil sign, and the Demon token. Replace their character token with the Demon token and put the new Demon to sleep.
name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

firstNightReminder: Wake any Village Idiot. They point to a player. Give a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Put that Village Idiot to sleep. Repeat unitl all Village Idiots have acted.
name: Village Idiot
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

firstNightReminder: When the first night has ended, declare that the Vizier is in play, and which player it is.
name: Vizier
ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

name: Yaggababble
ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
